::Spears::

"Cease to exist? What, destroying the ark will kill us all?"  She 
turned pale at the thought.  "But Preds wouldn't do that unless they 
had another plan to make sure they survived.  But what would it be?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker shruggs. "I have no idea. Destroying the Ark would probably 
cause 
> them to cease to exist as well."
